content: Sent this to my major; this is his reply ! Took me back a lot of years, TJ. She did a great job with the photos, and the music is perfect. Actually, I think old grainy pictures from the past are more impressive than sharp, clear pictures in visual presentations. They set the mood perfectly. Dutch
